name: Eevee's Balloon Adventure
description:
Eevee's sick of being made fun by his friends, so sets out on a journey to find his very own evolution stone! What friends and foes (mostly foes) will he meet along the way? What happens to all those enemies you plunge into the deep dark sea? And most importantly, why does this game only have 3 Eeveelutions? (I thought there were 8??)

Features:

  • Flappy bird(?) esc gameplay, but you can move left and right!
  • A short, casual experience (20~30 min)
  • 3 levels
  • 3 bosses
  • 3 Eeveelutions
  • 1 Eevee
  • PMD assets (available here if you want to use them!: https://archerzenmi.itch.io/pokmon-eeveelution-assets-godot)
  • A choice to evolve
  • Bullying a Flareon??

This is actually the very first game I've made on my own, so any feedback is appreciated! If you're interested in any of my other Eeveelution related shenanigans, check me out here: https://archerzenmi.carrd.co/. Now go! The world of Eevees awaits you!!
